name: Dungeons & Dragons 5E
content: Dungeons & Dragons (commonly abbreviated as D&D or DnD)[is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game (RPG) originally designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.[3][4][5]  The game was first published in 1974 by Tactical Studies Rules, Inc. (TSR).[5] It has been published by Wizards of the Coast (now a subsidiary of Hasbro) since 1997.
